title.narrative: Afghanistan Pension Administration and Safety Net Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to: (i) improve the administration of the public pension schemes; and (ii) developadministrative systems for safety nets interventions, with focus on targeting and benefit payment delivery, while delivering cashbenefits to thepoorest families in targeted pilot districts.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Labor, Social Affairs, Martyrs and Disabled

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section I – B.2.(b) | Description: MoLSAMD shall contract an independent technical/ financialauditor for cash transfers under Part 2 (b) By January 31, 2014
Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section I – B.2.(b) | Description: MoLSAMD shall submit to the Bank ToRs for an independenttechnical/ financial audit of Part 2 (b) by August 31, 2013

Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section I – D | Description: The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Management Framework and the environmental management plans, if any.
Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section IV- B.1.(a) (iii) and (iv) | Description: Condition of Disbursement under ExpenditureCategories 4 or 6: (d) The Adoption of a Safety Net Program Plan.
Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section IV- B.1.(a) (iii) and (iv) | Description: Condition of Disbursement under ExpenditureCategories 4 or 6: a) Appointment of a senior financial consultant

Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section IV- B.1.(a) (iii) and (iv) | Description: Condition of Disbursement under ExpenditureCategories 4 or 6: b) Reconciliation of disbursement information between project records and IDA records.
Finance Agreement : Schedule 2, Section IV- B.1.(a) (iii) and (iv) | Description: Condition of Disbursement under ExpenditureCategories 4 or 6: c) Submission of acceptable IFR for the Q1 of SL1392

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. A.1(a) | Description :Maintain throughout the period of implementation of the Project, asteering committee (the #Steering Committee#) chaired by the Minister of MoLSAMD or his authorized representative | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. (a) | Description :Adopt and thereafter carry out the Project in accordance with the ProjectImplementation Plan, which Plan includes a financial management manual and a procurement manual | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. A. 1(b) | Description :Maintain throughout the period of implementation of the Project, a ProjectCoordination Unit (the #PCU#) within MoLSAMD under the supervision of the GMU. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. A. 1(d) | Description :Cause MoLSAMD through the PCU to coordinate with MoF on the implementation ofPart 1(a)(vii) of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. B. (i) | Description :Cause the PCU to prepare a Pilot Safety Net Program Plan for the provision ofPilot Benefits and submit such plan to the Steering Committee for review and approval; | Due Date :17-Mar-2010
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. B. (ii) | Description :Cause the Steering Committee to make a final decision on the Pilot Safety NetProgram Plan, | Due Date :17-Mar-2010

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Sec IV- B. 1.(a)(iii) and (iv)| |Description: Condition of Disbursement under -ExpenditureCategories (4) or (6):Hiring a senior financial managment consultant for the Project Support Team, with qualifications, experienceand terms of reference acceptable to IDA; Reconciliation of financing records for the Original Project; Submission of interimfinancial reports of the [Q1 of SY1392] satisfactory to IDA. Expenditure Catgory (6): The Adoption of the Safetfy Net Program Planin accordance with Section I.B.2 (a) (i) of Schedule 2 to the Financing Agreement
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I - B.2.(b)| Description: MoLSAMD shall contract an independent technical/financial auditorfor cash transfers under Part 2 (b)
Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I - B.2.(b)| Description: MoLSAMD shall submit to the Bank ToRs for an independenttechnical/financial audit of Part 2 (b)

Finance Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I - D | Description: The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Management Framework and the environmental management plans, if any.
